alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 12 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Big Bend Florida and south central Georgia, including the following counties, in Big Bend Florida, Jefferson and Madison. In south central Georgia, Brooks and Thomas. * WHEN...Until 715 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 519 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen in the last 1 Hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Monticello, Greenville, Dills, Everett, Alma, Grooverville, Montivilla, Ashville, Aucilla, Casa Blanco, Jarrott, Drifton, Lois, Festus, Fincher, Nash, Lake Miccosukee, Lovett, Metcalf and Empress. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
